body:
To facilitate role playing, it would be cool to have something like a Dungeon Master (but avoid the "master" title) who can take control of NPCs and edit the game in real time. Basically let one (or more) player(s) control the reaction of the world to the player characters.  Roleplay conversations, spawn NPCs, load in or build levelsâ€¦ As long as the modding tools are simple enough to use, you could do this in real-time?

Related: #21 #23

milestone.title: Tools
milestone.description: Make the game easier to mod.
